thread.title: Picture Perfect; Neil Patrick Harris and David Burtka
thread.title_full: Picture Perfect; Neil Patrick Harris and David Burtka

title: Picture Perfect; Neil Patrick Harris and David Burtka
text:
facebook 162 SHARES 
The out-and-proud couple, Neil Patrick Harris and David Burtka are a role model for not only the LGBT youth but everyone in general. What started with a simple movie date, resulted in a relationship of over 13 years now! The two have ever been so much in love and are also raising two kids together. It just couldn't be any better than this right? A post shared by Neil Patrick Harris (@nph) on Jan 18, 2017 at 12:22pm PST
